name: pdf-editor
description: Professional PDF editing skill for rotating pages, replacing links/URLs, and adding company branding to footers. Perfect for fixing legacy documents with outdated internal links and page orientation issues.

commands.name: rotate-pages
commands.description: Rotate specific pages in a PDF by specified angles

commands.name: replace-urls
commands.description: Replace all instances of old text/URLs with new ones in a PDF

commands.name: add-footer
commands.description: Add company branding image to the footer of all pages
